alert.note: Alert for Grant; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Areal flooding caused by excessive rainfall Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Kansas, including the following counties, Grant and Kearny. * WHEN...Until noon CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations was occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms late Thursday afternoon. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 3.5 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mainly rural areas north of Ulysses. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
